ArmsDealerSpecialText.Party: A party is a good time to show off my new workout routine!
ArmsDealerSpecialText.Graveyard1: I promise none of these are my fault.
ArmsDealerSpecialText.Graveyard2: I'm not a fan of graveyards, it's a tough audiance for selling weapons to.
ArmsDealerSpecialText.Windy1: The wind reminds me of my home, I can't put my finger on why though...
ArmsDealerSpecialText.Windy2: Don't spray and pray in the wind, buddy!
ArmsDealerSpecialText.Storm1: How's the weather from down there?
ArmsDealerSpecialText.Storm2: Not sure about you, but I love the ambient noise of rain.
ArmsDealerSpecialText.Rain1: Nothing quite like a bit of rain.
ArmsDealerSpecialText.Rain2: Flying fish? I call it food.

TownNPCMood_ArmsDealer.NoHome: Got a place to set me up in, kidders?
TownNPCMood_ArmsDealer.FarFromHome: I don't like doin' business this far from home.
TownNPCMood_ArmsDealer.DislikeCrowded: How do you expect me to polish my knives with this much noise?
TownNPCMood_ArmsDealer.HateCrowded: How am I meant to work out effectively with all these people watching?
TownNPCMood_ArmsDealer.LoveSpace: This is what I'm talkin' about, privacy!
TownNPCMood_ArmsDealer.LikeBiome: {BiomeName} is secluded and great for business, shame there's no water about.
TownNPCMood_ArmsDealer.LoveBiome: I love {BiomeName}, I Just wish it had water in it.
TownNPCMood_ArmsDealer.DislikeBiome: Yeah, no, {BiomeName} makes me very uncomfortable. Frozen water? What's the deal with that?
TownNPCMood_ArmsDealer.HateBiome: I hate {BiomeName} - hunting isn't quite as fun if you're the prey!
TownNPCMood_ArmsDealer.LikeNPC: {Guide} is absolutely adorable. She's so short and cute!
TownNPCMood_ArmsDealer.DislikeNPC: I don't really like {NPCName} bein' on my turf, ya know?
TownNPCMood_ArmsDealer.HateNPC: I'd REALLY like to use {NPCName} as a range target sometime.
TownNPCMood_ArmsDealer.LikeNPC_Princess: I never would have expected it, man, but {NPCName} knows her way around a gun!

LegacyDialog.58: I heard there is a doll that looks very similar to {Guide} somewhere in the underworld. She's kinda cute even in doll form!
LegacyDialog.59: Make it quick! I've got a date with {Guide} in an hour.
LegacyDialog.60: I want what {Guide} is sellin'. What do you mean, she doesn't sell anything?
LegacyDialog.61: I wish I was as tall as my cousins...
LegacyDialog.62: {Guide} is mine, don't fucking try it.
LegacyDialog.63: What's {Demolitionist}'s problem? Does he even realize we sell completely different stuff?
LegacyDialog.64: Man, it's a good night not to talk to anybody, don't you think, {PlayerName}?
LegacyDialog.65: Regardless of wherever I am, they'll always be a good sunset.
LegacyDialog.66: I see you're eyeballin' the Minishark.. You really don't want to know how it was made.
LegacyDialog.67: Hey, this ain't a movie, pal. Ammo is extra.
LegacyDialog.68: Keep your hands off my gun, buddy!
